titleStmt.title: A vindication of Dr. Titus Oates from two late scurrilous libels written to create a dis-belief of the Popish plot : the one entituled A narrative by E. Settle : the other a modest vindication of Titus Oates, the Salamanca doctor, from perjury &c. / by A. Elliot.
titleStmt.author: Oates, Titus, 1649-1705.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Snowden for the author,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages stained and with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
